name: laois wind enregy awareness group
goal: Keeping an eye on EU/National energy policy and its affects on communities , and trying to present viewpoints from a 'citizen' viewpoint, rather than vested interest.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: eu energy policy & environmental law, and how it is interpted and enacted in member states. We attend and contribute to the pci selection process within commission,We also actively engage with our elected representatives in the EU parliament, and regularily meet with our MEP's.
